text: Are you a microwave? Cuz MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM
You're as hot as a metal slide in summer.
Out of all the stars in the sky, you're the brightest I see.
I don't need a thermal scope to see that you're hot.
Biology says you're 70% water, but I say you're 100% a cutie.
Something is wrong with my dictionary, when I look up the word perfect, the only result is your name for some reason.
They say death is the scariest thing, but personally the scariest thing would be my life without you.
Do you like geometry? Cuz you're acute.
Are you a Jalapeno? Cuz you're pretty hot.
Are you a camera? Cuz every time I see you I smile.
Are you a parking ticket? Because you’ve got FINE written all over you.
Are you from Tennessee? Because you're the only 10 I see!
I'm going to stuff you in my freezer because you're so hot.
Roses are red, my face is too.. that only happens when I see you.
Besides being cute, what do you do for a living?
I'm no photographer, but I can picture us together.
Feel my shirt. Know what it’s made of? Boyfriend material.
Good thing I have my library card because I am checking you out.
Do you have a map? I keep getting lost in your eyes.
Do you know CPR? Because you are taking my breath away!
You're so cute I forgot my pickup lines...
They say themeparks are the happiest places on earth. Well apparently, none of them have ever stood next to you.
Are you religious? Because you’re the answer to all my prayers.
I seem to have lost my phone number. Can I have yours?
Just me, your friendly neighborhood cat burglar, but this time I came to steal your heart.
I ought to complain to Spotify for you not being named this week’s hottest single.
No wonder the sky is gray all the color is in your eyes.
I’d like to take you to the movies, but they don’t let you bring in your own snacks.
You know what you would look really beautiful in? My arms.
Hi, I just wanted to thank you for the gift, I’ve been wearing this smile ever since you gave it to me.
I’ve heard it said that kissing is the ‘language of love.’ Would you care to have a conversation with me sometime?
On a scale of 1 to America, how free are you tonight?
Are you a search engine? Because you have everything I’m searching for.
Your hand looks heavy, can I hold it for you?
The sparkle in your eyes is so bright, the sun must be jealous.
Can you pinch my arm real quick? You’re so cute, I must be dreaming.
I’m not currently an organ donor, but I’d be happy to give you my heart.
There must be something wrong with my eyes, I can’t seem to take them off of you.
